content.question: Which of the following best describes a primary purpose of the poem?

choices.label: To encourage African Americans to participate in the Civil Rights movement
To encourage African Americans to emigrate and move back to Africa
To encourage African Americans to take pride in their progress and to continue to move forward
To remind African Americans of their common ancestral heritage and cultural achievements

content.answer: To encourage African Americans to take pride in their progress and to continue to move forward

topic.text: 3.8: Lifting as We Climb: Uplift Ideologies and Black Women's Rights and Leadership

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
